attributes.action: sack and prosecute fraudulent MPs and councillors of any party who put in false expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for Members of Parliment and councillors to be treated like the rest of the population when caught committing fraud to be sacked and to be tried by the people who they work for, us the public for submitting false expenses claims and to repay amount in full

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
